name: Snooze (LRFLEW)
description:
It's morning, and all you want to do is sleep in. Unfortunately, last-night you wanted to get up in the morning, and set multiple alarm clocks to wake you up. Hit snooze on all your alarms for as long as you can to get it as much extra sleep as you can.

Press P to pause the game

The pause menu includes a sensitivity slider to adjust the mouse / touch controls. The game is intended to feel sluggish to control, but different mice and touch screens have different inherent sensitivities, so you can use the sensitivity to tune the controls for your individual situation.

This was made for the Halcyon Frequency Summer Game Jam 2022 in less than 72 hours.

Developed using the Godot engine, licensed under the MIT License

Uses the Open Sans font, licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0

Uses the Analog Alarm Clock sound effect, licensed under the CC BY 4.0 License

Uses the song Sad Town from Kenney Game Assets 1, licensed under the CC0 License
